subject: Football
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Chris Ault’s tenure at Nevada is defined by the offense he created, the Pistol, an innovation honed by Colin Kaepernick and one that has became the rage in the N.F.L.
snippet: Chris Ault’s tenure at Nevada is defined by the offense he created, the Pistol, an innovation honed by Colin Kaepernick and one that has became the rage in the N.F.L.
